title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.10 - Attachments to walls and ceilings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.10 - Attachments to walls and ceilings

State Regulations

Light fixtures, vent covers, wall mounted fans, decorative materials and similar attachments to walls and ceilings shall be
easily cleanable and shall be maintained in good repair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.10

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
